revision.comment: remove categories: English words following the I before E except after C rule
revision.text: ==English== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|en|nyandi|yarndi}} ===Etymology=== From {{bor|en|wrh|nyaandi||thingamajig, what's-its-name}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # {{lb|en|Australian Aboriginal}} [[marijuana|Marijuana]]. #* '''1984,''' L. Fogarty, ''Ngutji'' #*: '''Yarndi''' = grass. #* '''1990,''' Davis et al., ''Paperbark'' #*: He made enough to ... keep himself in '''Nyandi''' (herb). #* '''1992,''' ''Today,'' Sept. #*: It’s just as well it doesn’t depend on our feelings. Good feelings just fade like '''Yarndi''' smoke. #* '''1992,''' R. L. Ginibi, ''Real Deadly'' #*: Ya can’t work hard, drink, and some '''yarndie''' too! #* '''1993,''' ''Koori Mail,'' 10 Mar. #*: I drank and smoked '''yarndie''' for fourteen years. ====Synonyms==== * See also [[Thesaurus:marijuana]] {{topics|en|Marijuana}}
